channel.title: Making 99 max lvl, AND making skill capes 99 required
channel.description: I use project czar source. I want to make the max stat lvl 99 and max combat 126. Also, if this i need to make skill capes only need lvl 99 to wear. While we are on this same page making money have a max of 2bil would be cool too, but thats not this issue.

item.title: Making 99 max lvl, AND making skill capes 99 required
item.dc:creator: @b1g_th13f b1g th13f
item.description:
@b1g_th13f wrote:

Go into your client.java, and search for this for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 100; lvl++) {
Youâ€™ll see somthing like this.

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 100; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } [code]return 100;
see where it says for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 100; lvl++) {
Change that to 99.

and where it says return 100;
Change that to 99.
then compile.

Thats to make the max lvl 126.
Idk about your skillcapes, im not that good at java.[/code]
